title: Saint-loup
author: Saint-loup
content: Sometimes online live casino games are boring even when you win because the dealer is not good at all while other times you spend a real good time despite losing because the dealer is very entertaining and funny.So do you have one (or more) favorite dealer at an online casino? What's his/her name? Which casino provider does he work for? What games does he manage? Why do you like him?

comments.author: ChiBitCTy
comments.body: My favorite dealer are attractive women if I’m being completely honest lol. It sure makes things a little better when I’m going through a bit of a cold streak. However I really try and avoid casinos games with live dealers. Something about them I just don’t trust all that much, I’d rather have an electronic dealer personally.

comments.author: n0ne
comments.body: I haven't got used to it. My personal choice of dealers is the support team of the casino I use. The conversation is really good to watch and for that reason quite often I used to make questions about the games and its partnering game providers. Once I get a VIP host I'll add him/her as the favourite dealer.

comments.author: alegotardo
comments.body: Quote from: Saint-loup on August 26, 2022, 09:04:31 PMSometimes online live casino games are boring even when you win because the dealer is not good at all while other times you spend a real good time despite losing because the dealer is very entertaining and funny.So do you have one (or more) favorite dealer at an online casino? What's his/her name? Which casino provider does he work for? What games does he manage? Why do you like him?Online games are not my favorites, I've only played them a few times and it's been a long time.I much prefer 100% electronic games.But I like to watch live games without having to bet and I think any dealer is valid as long as he doesn't act like a robot doing only what is essential for the game.

comments.author: harizen
comments.body: Quote from: Saint-loup on August 26, 2022, 09:04:31 PMSometimes online live casino games are boring even when you win because the dealer is not good at all while other times you spend a real good time despite losing because the dealer is very entertaining and funny.So do you have one (or more) favorite dealer at an online casino? What's his/her name? Which casino provider does he work for? What games does he manage? Why do you like him?Just curious here, can you give some input/s on how to tell if the dealer is not good?Isn't it not boring already when we are winning regardless of who the dealer is?I've asked this maybe because I really don't mind if dealers are boring or not as long as I enjoyed the game and especially if I'm winning.

comments.author: DoublerHunter
comments.body: Quote from: Saint-loup on August 26, 2022, 09:04:31 PMSometimes online live casino games are boring even when you win because the dealer is not good at all while other times you spend a real good time despite losing because the dealer is very entertaining and funny.So do you have one (or more) favorite dealer at an online casino? What's his/her name? Which casino provider does he work for? What games does he manage? Why do you like him?^ How I wish before to experience sexy dealers in the casino. Developers know that usually gamblers are men and they know that it lures gamblers if they will use sexy girls as a dealer in casino with a various games. It is very common in Blackjack, Poker, or in Rollette, a sexy dealer that you can interact with them, who knows here the sexy dealer Kimberly, the dealer in Infinite Blackjack, or the most I like Brooke, the Texas Hold’em Poker dealer. I have never experienced naked online dealers, how it will feel.

comments.author: Wexnident
comments.body: I don't think I've had any tbh. I've played with live dealers a few times but none of them really stuck for me, nor did I really ever want to actually interact with them (yes I hate socialization). I do interact with them if they start talking like I think it's basic courtesy to do so if they start it, but if they don't well I'm also perfectly fine with that. I just sit there and play while malding about how shtty my luck is for that day. Quote from: DoublerHunter on August 26, 2022, 11:56:55 PM^ How I wish before to experience sexy dealers in the casino. Developers know that usually gamblers are men and they know that it lures gamblers if they will use sexy girls as a dealer in casino with a various games. It is very common in Blackjack, Poker, or in Rollette, a sexy dealer that you can interact with them, who knows here the sexy dealer Kimberly, the dealer in Infinite Blackjack, or the most I like Brooke, the Texas Hold’em Poker dealer. I have never experienced naked online dealers, how it will feel.I honestly would be bothered if it was over the top kind of dealer thing, heck I'm actually a fan of dealers, either male or female just wearing those neat clean types of clothing. The one that makes them look really really mature and clean and professional, just gives them the vibe of being able to talk to you and answer pretty much anything you throw at them.

comments.author: mindrust
comments.body: Quote from: ChiBitCTy on August 26, 2022, 09:24:27 PMMy favorite dealer are attractive women if I’m being completely honest lol. It sure makes things a little better when I’m going through a bit of a cold streak. However I really try and avoid casinos games with live dealers. Something about them I just don’t trust all that much, I’d rather have an electronic dealer personally. Attractive women make this life bearable for men. Business owners know this too. I generally choose to do business with the establishments where there are more attractive young women because it is men’s nature to do so. :/ I can’t believe I am letting my dick taking over my brains but what can I do? It is the will of god that created men this way.Whenever I think about live dealers, I remember the movie “casino” and how Joe Pesci treated the dealer there. It was hilarious.

comments.author: darkangel11
comments.body: I guess I do what most gamblers do which is changing dealers frequently if you keep getting bad cards (poker) or the house gets 21 too often (blackjack). I don't get attached to any particular dealers. Quote from: mindrust on August 27, 2022, 04:25:14 AMAttractive women make this life bearable for men. Business owners know this too. I generally choose to do business with the establishments where there are more attractive young women because it is men’s nature to do so. :/ I can’t believe I am letting my dick taking over my brains but what can I do? It is the will of god that created men this way.Whenever I think about live dealers, I remember the movie “casino” and how Joe Pesci treated the dealer there. It was hilarious.Losing money is easier when it's to a pretty girl, right? The worst thing is when you get a thumbnail with a female dealer, you click on it and there's a guy there because they switched  First world problems...

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Online casinos? What would I do with anyone their or anything rather than to make money, to have excellent customer support, good deposit and promotional offers, good UI and excellent site with easy means of withdrawal, those are the reasons I can like an online casino.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: Quote from: harizen on August 26, 2022, 11:41:06 PMQuote from: Saint-loup on August 26, 2022, 09:04:31 PMSometimes online live casino games are boring even when you win because the dealer is not good at all while other times you spend a real good time despite losing because the dealer is very entertaining and funny.So do you have one (or more) favorite dealer at an online casino? What's his/her name? Which casino provider does he work for? What games does he manage? Why do you like him?Just curious here, can you give some input/s on how to tell if the dealer is not good?Isn't it not boring already when we are winning regardless of who the dealer is?I've asked this maybe because I really don't mind if dealers are boring or not as long as I enjoyed the game and especially if I'm winning.OP probably considers the dealer not "being good" if they don't talk, don't smile, don't interact with the players, etc... but I am not really sure why it would negatively affect the gamblers especially if they are winning but I also get that having an entertaining dealer would be good.Quote from: harizen on August 26, 2022, 11:41:06 PMI've asked this maybe because I really don't mind if dealers are boring or not as long as I enjoyed the game and especially if I'm winning.I agree

comments.author: Bitinity
comments.body: I dont really like live casino games, just not my thing to be honest. I played it few times only so I have no favorite dealers, but I have to say that the dealers from Evolution gaming are nice. There are many beautiful and sexy dealers. I'm not really sure if players take this as a consideration to play the game. If I have to play live game, I would not care about who is the dealer because I want to gamble not to watch the dealer. I can even say that beautiful and sexy girl may change your mindset or your plan while gambling, so be careful and stay on your gambling limit/style.

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: I have played Live Casino a lot of times but to be honest, I never felt like I have someone special dealer nor I have ever tried to know their name even lol. However, in a poker game in Thunderpick (can't remember exactly), I felt like I used to win if the lady was the dealer. I had some gain when she was the dealer but when she got changed, I lost everything I won lol.

comments.author: Rruchi man
comments.body: Correct me if I am wrong, but are casino dealers not features of offline casino? are there any need for Casino dealers in online casinos when the functions which casino dealers perform which include; Monitoring the gambling table to ensure that rules are followed and the winner determined has become automated?Quote from: Saint-loup on August 26, 2022, 09:04:31 PMSometimes online live casino games are boring...IMO, An online live casino will be boring if it has a poor UI design and unentertaining sound track, It will not offer satisfaction and a good experience.

comments.author: Doell
comments.body: I'm a man, of course I like women especially if they have a beautiful face and smile, but if the bet I make always loses on that table, then I will change tables. If I see male of dealers somehow I'm immediately not interested to sit down, the reason is like most other a men who do not want to see the appearance of a similar mustache "just kidding". So honestly they are all interesting but none of the dealers are my favourites.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: If i may get to the point seems most of you are being in love with the female dealer, what really matters is that if you are making progress by winning the live casino or playing offline you won't care about looking over there dealers since you are on a win win side. Quote from: Doell on August 27, 2022, 12:22:08 PMof course I like women especially if they have a beautiful face and smilelols.I guess you could probably have a very slim chances maybe getting carried away by their beautiful faces just as you said which might kept you interesting with them if there is any little difficulty then you hit up support.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: Quote from: Doell on August 27, 2022, 12:22:08 PMI'm a man, of course I like women especially if they have a beautiful face and smile, but if the bet I make always loses on that table, then I will change tables. If I see male of dealers somehow I'm immediately not interested to sit down, the reason is like most other a men who do not want to see the appearance of a similar mustache "just kidding". Liking women as dealers doesn't really make much difference if you are talking online casinos because you don't have the chance of close admiration or to say a word that can even add some pulse to your "third leg" lol. Online female casino dealers are just what you view but for offline, you can have a chance for a date if your game is tight

comments.author: Webetcoins
comments.body: Quote from: Saint-loup on August 26, 2022, 09:04:31 PMSometimes online live casino games are boring even when you win because the dealer is not good at all while other times you spend a real good time despite losing because the dealer is very entertaining and funny.So do you have one (or more) favorite dealer at an online casino? What's his/her name? Which casino provider does he work for? What games does he manage? Why do you like him?I recently tried live casino games but I am not paying attention to the dealer or the host of the game but im more focused on the results that are being shown on my screen. The exciting feeling to win is still there. Win or lose, both are fine for me but maybe to some they will feel incomplete once they lose and the host of the live game is also boring but if they win, I think that boring feeling will change, more if the win is big enough.The dealer or the host of the live games are not being hired to make jokes in front of the people or to entertained them but their main purpose is only to draw the games or call the results. People shouldn't expect more from them.

comments.author: madnessteat
comments.body: I have long been unable to play in a land-based casino and enjoy playing with a real dealer because in my country the zone where such games are allowed is very far away. I have to settle for online games. But I, like many men are attracted to beautiful girls dealers. Beautiful girls can attract special attention to themselves, and it does not matter where they work at a trade show, a car dealership or a casino. They are always a pleasure to look at.

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: Of course, I like people who can attract our attention to spend time playing gambling but I sometimes don't remember what his name is and which casino he works from because I also often move casinos to play gambling. But I don't make him a favourite dealer because we see him often and rarely see anyone other than him. If the dealer is a person who can be entertaining and funny, I think he will be liked by many so that people will spend more time gambling.
